column4: Auto start script is not working properly. I have put a script in init.d. I could found it running but I am not getting the expected result
Hi all ,  Auto start script is not working properly. I have put a script in init.d. I could found it running but I am not getting the expected result. Please help me
Hi all ,  Auto start script is not working properly. I have put a script in init.d. I could found it running but I am not getting the expected result. Please help me
A notification. Usually appear at the top right corner .. notify-send is the command I used..
would you mind posting the script to pastebin? i can help better if i have the script.
are you positively sure you have notify-send (libnotify-bin) installed?
and, you want this to run, at boot time?
notify-send will not work at boot. X isn't started yet, which means notify-send has no where to go.
i suggest just running it at login
oky.. can you tell me how to add a script to run at login tile
I want to do this through a shell script
